page.title: 18MORE LOCAL HISTORY.
page.content: In 1646, Cromwell's army met Royalist troops at Bovey Heath and defeated them. The officers were playing cards in Bovey Tracey. They managed to escape capture by throwing the stakes out of the window.Whilst Cromwell's soldiers fought over the money the officers escaped! The Arch in Abbey road,called Cromwell's Arch is in fact earlier than Cromwell and is thought to be part of an old Priory. Bovey bridge was built in 1642 just before Cromwell arrived.This is probably why the army came through Bovey Tracey.It was the best point to cross the River Bovey.
